com.ibm.xasdi_bridge

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncReply, BroadCastMessage, IndividualMessage, MultiCastMessage

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Unit of data transferred between Citizens and Region objects.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CITIZEN_ADD
      Used by XASDI when citizen object will be added.
      static int CITIZEN_MOVE
      Used by XASDI when citizen object will be moved to another X10 Place.
      static int CITIZEN_REMOVE
      Used by XASDI when citizen object will be removed.
      static int CONSOLE
      Represents this message is used for console output.
      static int ERROR
      Represents error.
      static int MULTICAST_ONEWAY
      Sent to several agents and not expect reply.
      static int MULTICAST_REQUEST_RESPONSE
      Sent to several agents and expect replies.
      boolean needReply
      Whether this message needs reply message.
      static int ONEWAY
      Sent to one agent and not expect reply.
      static int REQUEST_RESPONSE
      Sent to one agent and expect reply.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Message()
      Default constructor especially used as sending to Region.
      Message(int type)
      Constructor used generally.

      • getFields

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getFields()
        Get field variables in a agent to migrate.
        Returns:
        HashMap about field variables (Key is name, Value is value)

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Get text data. If this message is used for agent migration, it represents Class name.
        Returns:
        Text data bound this message

      • getDestRegionID

        public long getDestRegionID()
        Get Region ID of message destination.
        Returns:
        If this message is used for agent removing, return -1. Otherwise, Region ID of destination.

      • getOrigRegionID

        public long getOrigRegionID()
        Get Region ID of message origin.
        Returns:
        If this message is used for agent adding, return -1. Otherwise, Region ID of origin.

      • getCitizenID

        public long getCitizenID()
        Get ID of agent to migrate.
        Returns:
        Citizen ID as long type

        Get message type.
        Returns:
        Message type as int type

      • fromCitizen

        public boolean fromCitizen()
        Get whether this message is sent from agent.
        Returns:
        If this message is sent from agent, return true.

      • getSenderID

        public CitizenID getSenderID()
        Gets ID of the citizen which replied to the request message. Null will be returned when this message is not a reply message.
        Returns:
        citizen ID of the sender or null if this message is not a reply message.
